List<JBCXM__PickList__c> pkList = new List<JBCXM__PickList__c>();

List<String> utList = new List<String>{'Emails Sent Count', 'Files Upload Count', 'Data Base Size Used', 'Network Traffic Created'};
Delete [SELECT ID FROM JBCXM__PickList__c WHERE Name IN: utList];
integer i=150;
for(String s : utList) {
	JBCXM__PickList__c pk = new JBCXM__PickList__c(Name = s,
													JBCXM__SystemName__c = s,
													JBCXM__Category__c = 'Adoption Measure Types',
													JBCXM__Attribute1__c = '#DC143C',
													JBCXM__Active__c = true,
													JBCXM__UsageTrackingMeasure__c = true,
													JBCXM__DisplayOrder__c	= ++i);
	pkList.add(pk);
}
insert pkList;
